attributes.action: Bring Back The Hanging Sentence For Pedophiles.
attributes.additional_details: These filth usually always walk free from court.and the childrens life will never be the same again.a lot will take their own lifes.we should protect our children..i for one would commit murder if someone did anything to my kids.please bring back hanging so innocent children can have justice and help to rebuild their lives..and less of these things roaming about
attributes.background: Too many of these monsters walk free from court.they should be hung.not walking the street living normal lives when they have commited disgusting crimes against innocent children.
